price: Nyankopͻn, awurade foforͻ biara nni hͻ gyesε Ɔno (nko ara); (Ɔne) Otumfoͻ a Ɔde Ne ho te Neho ase daa, kuta abͻdeε nyinaa mu, san bͻ wͻn ho ban.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa al-ḥayu al-qayūmu
translations: the Sustainer of all that exists
